item.title: Jesse McCartney - Beautiful Soul
item.description:
작곡: Sung by / 작사: Adam Watts, A.Dodd
KY: 60888 / KY: 21267

I don’t want
another pretty face
I don’t want
just anyone to hold
I don’t want my love
to go to waste
I want you and
your beautiful soul

something special
